name: Mini The Moisturizing Fresh Cream
about: What it is:A feather-light cream that renews skin’s youthful bounce for refreshed balance and a firmer feel, ideal for oilier skin..Skin Type:Normal, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, Oiliness.Highlighted Ingredients:- Miracle Broth™️: Helps balance sebum and banish excess oil..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, phthalates, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and triclosan..What Else You Need to Know:The Moisturizing Fresh Cream is infused with Miracle Broth to balance sebum and defend against signs of aging.
ingredients: -Miracle Broth™️: Helps balance sebum and banish excess oil..-Moisture Matrix Technology: Creates a cushion of healing moisture to diffuse youth-renewing activity..-Lime Tea: Proprietary antioxidant, neutralizes free radicals to protect skin...WaterAquaEau, Dimethicone, Algae Extract, Glycerin, Yeast ExtractFaexExtrait De Levure, Trisiloxane, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Alcohol Denat., Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Isopentyldiol, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Peel Extract, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Medicago Sativa (Alfalfa) Seed Powder, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seedcake, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Seed Meal, Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Leaf Oil, Sodium Gluconate, Copper Gluconate, Calcium Gluconate, Magnesium Gluconate, Zinc Gluconate, Tocopheryl Succinate, Niacin, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Powder, Bis-Peg-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Lactobacillus Ferment, Trametes Versicolor Extract, Trehalose, Squalane, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Sigesbeckia Orientalis (St. Paul's Wort) Extract, Caffeine, Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline, Whey ProteinLactis ProteinProteine Du Petit-Lait, Hydrolyzed Rice Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Laminaria Digitata Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Iris Florentina Root Extract, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Sucrose, Saccharide Isomerate, Peg-8, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Oleth-10, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Glyceryl Polymethacrylate, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene, Linalool, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Tocopheryl Acetate, Bht, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Disodium Edta, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Tromethamine, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Twice daily after cleansing and prepping skin with The Infused Lotion (sold separately), sweep two to three pumps of The Serum Essence (sold separately) directly onto face and neck using fingertips.  .-Follow with The Concentrated Night Balm (sold separately) at night. .-Complete the routine with your La Mer Fresh Cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Long time user of the prior version cool gel cream.  This crème is terrible in comparison. My skin feels rougher and tighter after using, not hydrated. Also the smell is intense and not in an enjoyable way.  Disappointed is an understatement … d disappointed.

reviews.review_title: Disappointed long time La Mer user
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m 57. I used the previous versions of this gel cream for 15+ years and my skin was so soft and hydrated. It was my favorite cream. After going through a jar of this new version, my skin is rougher and has less of a glow, even with my other skincare staples, vitamin c/e serum and hyaluronic acid serum. It’s also not as cooling and refreshing.  Time to look for a new moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe this isn’t the right formula for my combo acne prone skin but this was a big ole “meh” from me. It moisturized enough for me to not be dry and that was about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best cream I’ve ever used period. You won’t regret it. I’ve tried almost everything from La mer. This paired along w the Creme de la mer in the evening is literally amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the one ladies !   Could not use the original formula as it would cause me to breakouts but this one is amazing.  Been using it for a month now and my skin feels great.  It’s a splurge but hey it’s worth it .

reviews.review_text: Wonderful moisturizer! I don’t write reviews often, but this cream is very good. A little goes a long way and results are visible after the first use or two. I will continue to purchase. This La Mer cream has worked well.

reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by lamer, and I love it so much! It's so lightweight and hydrating, which is really important for me because I have dry and sensitive skin. If I use any products that are too heavy or oily, I tend to break out. It's just pricey, so it's a splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVEEE this product so much wow. it’s really great and i have been loving it. it doesn’t break me out at all and it leaves my skin feeling super dewy and hydrated. this stuff is great and i definitely recommend it!! gifted by lamer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer gifted me this product and I could not be more happy with it. It not only feels amazing but it leaves my skin feel hydrated but not greasy. As someone who is suffering with adult acne it is great that it doesn’t break me out either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is great for combination to oily skin that is in need of smoothing, firmness and pore diminishment. It can be worn under makeup and or spf nicely and used morning and night. I have given it 4 stars because of the cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from lamer. Overall this was a very nice moisturizer. For the cost though, I did not feel it was as great as I was anticipating. I think for a higher budget it would be great but for being affordable the cost can be somewhat a put-off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely in love with this moisturizer. It has the perfect consistency and a little goes a long way for me. I love that it is light weight but yet leaves my skin looking and felling hydrated. I would definitely recommend. Offered by lamer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by LaMer the Moisturizing Fresh Cream. It had helped my skin feel hydrated. I would apply it every evening. The one thing I would say that could affect people with sensitive skin is that it does have a light fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Lamer. Loved how moisturizing this cream is. Came in handy during winter season where my skin is extremely dry. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. The cream is lightweight and love the fresh scent.

I decided to splurge and treat myself by trying this out as I’ve heard everybody rave about this for ages - and it did not disappoint. It moisturizes my skin like no other leaving it perfectly plump and hydrated without being too heavy and sitting on my skin. Wish I tried this sooner  Gifted by lamer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This new moisturizing fresh cream is complimentary from La Mer. It has a strong but bearable scent, and it feels very nourishing on the skin. I noticed firmer, more hydrated, glowy skin after using this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While I typically opt for more budget-friendly moisturizers, I decided to treat myself to La Mer's moisturizing fresh cream, which was gifted to me by the brand. I must say, I was pleasantly surprised by the results. After just a few applications, my skin felt noticeably softer and smoother, and my makeup went on more seamlessly. It's become my go-to daytime moisturizer. The light scent is just a bonus, not overpowering at all. If you're willing to invest, I definitely recommend giving it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is gifted by La Mer. This formula is lightweight and doesn't make my skin feel sticky or greasy. I have been using this product for a week now and my face is hydrated and soft. If you're boujie, I recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually do not leave negative reviews, but found nothing special about this cream. It has some weird smell ( the product should either have no smell or some fragrance) but this I did not like at all. As far as moisturizing goes, it similar to any other regular cream. #gifted by lamer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who's tried their fair share of skincare products, I'm always curious about how the pricey ones stack up in the long run. But honestly, this one's a bit too thick for my taste. Even when cooler/dryer weather, it just doesn't feel quite right. With so many other creams I prefer, I can't really see myself splurging on this considering its performance. Gifted by lamer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer Moisturizing Fresh Cream is truly a luxurious experience for your skin. It hydrates deeply, leaving your skin feeling plump and radiant. A little goes a long way, making it worth the investment. Highly recommend for those looking to indulge in a top-of-the-line moisturizer. gifted by lamer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t like anything about this. lol La Mer face creams are so overrated & overpriced. First off, does anyone actually like the scent of these products? It’s smells so artificial & just not good imo. WHY?! The first two ingredients are just water & silicones.. For this price point, I expect the bulk of the formula to be better quality ingredients. I could be wrong, but I didn’t see mineral oil/paraffin/petroleum listed in this one, while they are in La Mer’s other face creams, so that is one possible improvement at least. If you want any moisture, this is not for you. Definitely for oily skin girlies only. I normally have very clear skin. I test new skincare frequently & this is the first cream that’s broken me out in forever. I do avoid silicones & artificial fragrance in my usual routine, so I imagine they’re the culprits. It also made my favorite trusted tinted SPF pill on me, which it has never done in the 3 years of using it. Again, probably the crazy high silicone content’s fault. So definitely need silicone-based base products with this. Yes, there are some good ingredients mixed into this water & silicone-based formula, but the cons are just so bad, I can’t see any beneficial pros from them :( I received sample sizes to test, so I can’t comment on the quality of the actual packaging, however, that doesn’t look impressive from the pictures. lol Hopefully it’s at least glass, but dang, it’s looks cheap & ugly & that’s just sad for something high-end. Do yourself a favor & get one of the hundreds of moisturizers that are far superior & cheaper. *gifted by lamer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this moisturizing cream. I used it for a bit and I feel like my skin got better within days. It's a bit sticky on consistency so you need to wait for it to dry fully before applying makeup or going to sleep. Gifted by lamer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The texture feels thick and moisturizing. The product actually isn’t filled up all the way and that makes me question if it’s worth the price. Little goes a long way and nice to use at night before sleep. The scent is nice and is hydrating for my dry skin. Gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not usually one to splurge on a moisturiser but I’ve wanted to try La Mer for a while, so I’m glad I was able to try the moisturising fresh cream (gifted by La mer). I found that my skin felt more supple and smooth after just a few uses, and even my makeup applied better! This is the perfect day time moisturizer, and I can tell it’ll be great even during the summer. It has a light scent, but nothing overpowering. If it’s in your budget, I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by La mer. This cream is my favorite from the La Mer. It melts into my skin easily and is so moisturizing. This layers well with other products and under my make up. Would purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this by La Mer. I have been a fan of the cream for years and years as my mom is almost 80 and I have watched her use it for years. I really think for my dry skin the regular cream is my favorite but I absolutely love the texture of this. It is the perfect summer cream. It’s not as much of a thin gel as I thought it would be…it’s a creamy gel- but not too creamy! Enough to know you are getting moisture but it’s not going to leave behind all kinds of oil and extra humectants for those who have oilier skin but need hydration as well. I was really satisfied with it. And I tried it on my mom and she liked it a lot. Offered by lamer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer .. very moisturizing cream that doesn’t feel weighted on my skin nor does it feel heavy. It’s the perfect consistency to provide hydration on a warm day or a cap day. It wasn’t too much for my combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer's Moisturizing Fresh Cream is a luxurious, hydrating treat for your skin. Its lightweight formula absorbs quickly, leaving skin feeling soft and revitalized. Perfect for daily use, it delivers long-lasting moisture and a radiant glow. Treat your skin to this indulgent cream and experience the difference!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This La Mer moisturizing cream feels amazing and makes such a difference in how my skin feels after using it. My skin has been so dry, so I’ve been looking for something that really helps and this is it! I received this product complimentary from lamer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using La Mer's The Moisturizing Fresh Cream for a while now, and it's truly a game-changer. This lightweight yet deeply hydrating cream leaves my skin feeling incredibly soft and nourished. It absorbs quickly without any greasy residue, making it perfect for both morning and evening use. I've noticed a significant improvement in the texture and overall appearance of my skin since incorporating this cream into my routine. While it's definitely a splurge, a little goes a long way, and the results are worth every penny. If you're in search of a luxurious moisturizer that delivers visible results. Gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer, I'm thoroughly impressed by the luxurious feel of this cream. It strikes the perfect balance, delivering deep hydration and nourishment without feeling too heavy on the skin. While it may come with a higher price tag, the results make it entirely worthwhile. I wholeheartedly recommend it, giving it a solid 10/10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The moisturizing fresh cream is overall a good one. It kept my skin hydrated all day. It worked well when I applied my foundation on, made my skin hydrated and well taken care of, like fresh. It has a scent, but not overwhelming. Gifted by La Mer to give my honest opinion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it was a complimentary from lamer but this was so refreshing on my skin. my skin looked so dull and dehydrated before I put this on and once i did it made my skin look so much more glowy and looked hydrated as well. the moisturizer is also refreshing and makes your makeup base look amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels very luxurious! The cream is fairly thick and made my skin feel pretty soft and hydrated. Not an every night thing but good if you have dry skin or on those nights you could use extra moisture. Liked it but unsure if I would buy! Gifted by lamer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer in exchange for my honest review of the product. This one is pricey but wow is it AMAZING! Very hydrating and creamy. Highly recommend if you have dry skin. This product is 100% worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer in exchange for an honest review. I have been wanting to try this luxurious cream, and it did not disappoint! It is a thicker cream, and my skin felt very hydrated and moisturized after. Excited to try this long-term. Would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer everyone needs to try!!! My skin felt so amazing after just one use. It’s hydrating but doesn’t feel like it clogs my pores. Gives a beautiful glow during the day and can be used both AM and Pm. Highly recommend since a little product goes a long ways. I was gifted by LaMer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from lamer. This is a very lovely and hydrating cream. It’s also so lightweight, perfect for my combination skin type. It sinks into my skin so nice, leaving it plump and moisturized without leaving me feeling greasy. Works so pretty under makeup as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer - this new moisturizing fresh cream is the perfect little go to in my routine especially when traveling. It packs a lot of moisture and a little goes a long way. I’m obsessed with the packaging as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer. I liked the texture of the moisturizer it seems very hydrating and has nice subtle scent. Little goes long way, it feels nice for my sensitive dry skin. It applied well under makeup.

reviews.review_title: So smooth, feels luxurious. Very moisturizing!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by lamer, all thoughts opinions etc are honest and my own.  The La Mer moisturizer works beautifully, the formula is really thick and luxurious feeling. It has a lovely perfume and goes on so smooth. Before having dry skin, after using it this really helped to bring moisture and smooth the texture of the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first product I’ve tried from La Mer. Can definitely say I liked this moisturizer… Its light, hydrating and leaves skin glowy. Before using it my skin felt thirsty but after just a couple of uses, it was glowing! This was gifted to me by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer: I love this new LA Mer Moisturizing Fresh Cream it feels so lightweight on my skin without feeling greasy. My skin has been quite sensitive lately - it helped calm my skin and reduce redness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer's new moisturizing face cream offers a luxurious skincare experience. Its rich texture glides effortlessly onto the skin, delivering intense hydration and leaving a velvety smooth finish. The cream absorbs quickly, providing instant comfort and leaving the skin feeling nourished and revitalized.

This cream is so moisturizing and has the best scent. I’m not normally a big fan of fragrance in my products but this smells so rich and luxurious. I highly recommend it to anyone. Super moisturizing without feeling greasy. Gifted by lamer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer. I have enjoyed using the samples of the Moisturizing Fresh Cream. I’ve primarily used in the AM as it doesn’t quite have enough moisture for my normal, mature skin. But I think the gel cream consistency is perfect for morning, and seems to layer well with my other skincare products and under makeup. It specifically says for oily skin types, and I think this is actually perfect for that skin type. Love how it feels on my skin, and it definitely looks hydrated. Mild fragrance which I typically don’t care for in skincare but it didn’t bother me. Too soon to tell if there were any changes with my skin, and would probably need a full size product. I’ve enjoyed it and would consider buying for morning use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin, so I tend to look for daily moisturizers that will moisturize, hydrate and do all the things without being greasy on the face. La Mer is such a bougie brand, I was so stoked to try their newest moisturizer that is geared more towards ones with oily skin. It has a gel-cream like consistency and it absorbs into the skin so well. My skin feels super hydrated after applying and wears well under makeup. I can see why so many love La Mer! They know what they’re doing when it comes to skincare! Gifted by LaMer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Lamer. Im obsessed with the new moisturizing fresh cream! My skin feels amazing!! After one use, my skin feels so smooth. Before, my skin was very dry and always needed to moisturize throughout the day. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Lamer. I have skin on the drier side but La Mer's Moisturizing Fresh Cream still works for me. It's light and hydrating and absorbs quickly. I have to use it for a bit longer to see results in terms of helping with signs of aging, but I’ve used their skincare in the past and have been pleased. While it might be a splurge it’s definitely worth the investment, even if you're not battling oily skin. I think the most noticeable thing for me was how soft my skin felt the next day after waking up.

reviews.review_title: Love how my skin feels soft and supple afterwards
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a rich, hydrating and refreshing luxurious cream. Love how my skin feels soft and supple after applying it. It has a thick consistency but it doesn’t feel heavy on the face, it absorbs quickly, it’s ultra moisturizing…perfect for my combination skin. Overall a great product, I don’t like the price much, to be honest. Gifted by Lamer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best moisturizer I’ve ever used! Literally little bit goes a long way! My skin looks so much better after using it for a day! Skin looks so moisturized and plump! Definitely worth a try! Highly recommend!! Offered by lamer

It doesn't bother me but it is heavily fragranced.  It smells like perfume so if you are sensitive to scent, you might not like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Offered by lamer. I love this so far. It makes my skin feel so nicely moisturized and hydrated. I have a nice dewy glow after I apply it. It feels good and lightweight. Does not leave a sticky feeling behind and a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La mer. I’m shook by the results! My skin is glowing, It is a game changer! Smells amazing and leave my skin very smooth and hydrated with a really velvety texture. I really recommend worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: What a lovely product! This was gifted by la mer. Absolutely and I would finish the product that was sent to me.. however, would I repurchase at its cost? Probably not because there are other cheaper alternatives similar in function.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A very generously hydrating moisturizer for those who want a little bit of a luxe experience. I do think that the hydration was great but if you have oily skin, this product may make your skin a bit more greasy. Gifted by Lamer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I already know I love this moisturizer, so happy to get gifted by la mercy to try out their moisturizer. It is a classic for a reason. It feels so luxurious, smells really good, almost like a spa. Leaves my skin moisturized and glowing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: gifted by la mer for my experience, this is was perfect for my really dry flaky skin. it was always so hard to find a very nourishing cream for my dry skin and i think this one really got it for me. its rich and very moisturizing, definitely worth giving a try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely a very nice cream.  Zero complaints about it. It's very refreshing, leaves your skin smooth and luminous, and has the perfect texture. However, I didn't notice anything incredible in particular. So I'm not sure it justifies the price point.  Complimentary from La Mer.

Since adding this into my routine, I notice that my skin feels plumped and hydrated. I really like how there’s no mineral oil in this version but there is dimethicone. I do wish this was unscented though because there is a fragrance that I’m not particularly fond of.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this complimentary from la mer. This product is a classic for a reason. It feels so thin in my hands but it moisturizes my face like it's a thick cream. I always feel so luxurious when I use this, and like I'm giving my skin a real treat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my honest review. And my honest review you will get. As a dry skin girl, I did end up having to layer this to avoid patchiness throughout the day. It felt nourishing, even layered. But the con- at this price point, I need something that is SPECIAL. I need to see results. And I didn’t over the few days of my trial, so I don’t see myself repurchasing.

Overall, La Mer Moisturizing Fresh Cream lives up to its reputation as a cult favorite in the realm of luxury skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with oily skin, I'm always on the lookout for products that moisturize without leaving a heavy or greasy feeling. I decided to give The New Moisturizing Fresh Cream 3.5ml a try and, honestly, I'm impressed!  From the moment I applied the cream, I noticed its light and refreshing texture. It absorbed quickly without leaving any shiny residue, which is a huge relief. Often, moisturizers make my skin feel even oilier, but with this cream, my skin felt comfortable and balanced.  Hours later, my skin still felt soft and there were no signs of excessive shine. Even under makeup, the cream acted as an excellent base, keeping my skin nourished without compromising the durability of my foundation.  What I liked the most was how my skin looked healthier and how the cream worked in harmony with my oily skin rather than against it. I will definitely continue using The New Moisturizing Fresh Cream and am excited to see how it improves my skin with continued use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with sensitive skin constantly on the lookout for products that deliver both effectiveness and gentleness, I was delighted to be gifted by La Mer their New Moisturizing Fresh Cream. From its elegant packaging to its luxurious texture, this moisturizer has truly become a staple in my skincare routine.  Upon application, the cream glides effortlessly onto the skin, leaving behind a sensation of instant refreshment and renewal. I particularly enjoy the ritual of applying this cream each day, as it imparts a feeling of indulgence that sets the tone for my skincare regimen. The scent is divine, adding to the overall experience of pampering oneself.  After incorporating this product into my routine for just two weeks, I have noticed a remarkable improvement in the texture and appearance of my skin. Not only does it feel smoother to the touch, but it also looks more radiant and revitalized. The cream's ability to provide hydration without weighing down the skin is truly commendable, especially for someone with sensitive skin like mine.  Overall, I wholeheartedly recommend La Mer's The New Moisturizing Fresh Cream to anyone in search of a high-quality moisturizer that delivers results. Its refreshing formula, delightful scent, and noticeable effects make it a standout product in the realm of skincare. Whether you're looking to pamper yourself or address specific skin concerns, this cream is sure to become a beloved addition to your beauty arsenal.

reviews.review_text: As someone deeply invested in skincare, I recently incorporated La Mer Moisturizing Cream into my regimen, and the results have been nothing short of remarkable.  La Mer's reputation precedes itself, and this cream lives up to every expectation. Its luxurious texture glides effortlessly onto the skin, delivering an instant surge of hydration. From the moment of application, my skin feels replenished and deeply nourished.  What sets La Mer apart is its ability to not only hydrate but also to visibly improve the texture and appearance of the skin over time. With continued use, I've noticed a significant reduction in fine lines and improved overall radiance.  Despite its indulgent feel, La Mer Moisturizing Cream absorbs quickly, leaving behind a velvety smooth finish that serves as the perfect canvas for makeup application.  In summary, La Mer Moisturizing Cream is a skincare investment worth making. Its transformative properties and luxurious experience make it a standout product in any skincare routine. Highly recommended for those seeking unparalleled hydration and rejuvenation. Gifted by Lamer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Having tried La Mer's New Moisturizing Fresh Cream, I'm impressed by its feather-light texture and the way it effortlessly renews my skin's youthful bounce. As someone with oilier skin, finding a moisturizer that strikes the right balance between hydration and oil control is crucial, and this cream does just that. The 3.5ml sample size is generous enough to allow for a thorough trial, and I appreciate that it's formulated without harsh ingredients like parabens, formaldehydes, and sulfates. Knowing that it's free of these chemicals gives me peace of mind about what I'm putting on my skin. The Miracle Broth-infused formula feels luxurious upon application, and I can feel it working to rebalance sebum production and defend against signs of aging. After incorporating it into my skincare routine, I've noticed an improvement in my skin's firmness and elasticity, as well as a reduction in excess oiliness. Overall, La Mer's Moisturizing Fresh Cream has exceeded my expectations, delivering on its promise of refreshed balance and a firmer feel. It's become a staple in my skincare regimen, and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for an effective moisturizer, especially those with oilier skin types like mine. Gifted by lamer.

It has another scent I’m not familiar with but it dissipates fairly quickly once applied to the skin.   This does have a nice gel texture that absorbs fast and leaves my skin feeling pleasantly hydrated. No major dewy or glowy finish but I think this would work best with oily or normal skin types. I am dry to normal skin type during the winter months too. I find this to be the perfect amount of hydration and texture. If you have super dry skin, I’m not sure if this will be hydrating enough. Though you can always pair it with a facial oil too. I am enjoying this so far and would recommend to anyone looking for a new boujee moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product.. love how my skin absorbs it all The texture is amazing smooth and creamy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Lamar this moisturizing face cream is amazing I love to use it for my skin care and also when priming for my makeup routine it’s a must in your skincare products I would definitely recommend if you’re considering

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the cream! It feels satiny and light but really rich and nourishing on the skin. I’ve liked the cream for many years now, and it’s a staple in my kit. It has a really pleasant smell, sits beautifully on the skin, leaves a dewy, moisturized feeling on the skin, and takes care of all the dry spots. I like it both in the morning and F night (but I wait a bit to make sure it gets time to get into the skin thoroughly). Really great cream! It was gifted by Lamer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand I mean honestly who wouldn’t it’s one of the most coveted brands and all of skin care. Well, it’s very expensive. It does work very well on my skin. However, if you’re not willing to spend that there are other products I can get you close to these results. Offered by lamer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Lamer this most amazing cream that truly embodies luxury, and I've been eager to experience this cream for quite some time. Its texture is divine, leaving my skin feeling nourished and rejuvenated. With my dry skin, I'm excited to incorporate it into my skincare routine from spring through fall. Not only does it combat signs of aging, but it's also formulated without harsh chemicals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Lamer.I have been super curious about La Mer Products ever since seeing Youtubers use it consistently back in the day so as I got older, I started taking skin care more seriously so I decided to give the products a try and honestly ever since using this moisturizer my skin is so plump and hydrated and actually stays hydrated all day, which is perfect for when I do make up as well so I will continue to purchase this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a complimentary from Lamer.  This moisturizer is different from the original one and I liked a lot because I have oily skin. It’s lightweight and I feel my skin smooth and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product feels so luxurious, I have very dry skin so I’m picky about moisturizers and creams and this one is excellent, it leaves my skin feeling hydrated and plump even the next morning after use! Absolutely love! This was gifted by lamer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by La Mer. This cream is so so lovely!! This is the first face cream I’ve tried by them, and honestly it feels the price. It instantly hydrated and plumps the skin. I would recommend trying this if it’s within your price range!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from La Mer. Love this cream for everyday use, great for oily skin as it doesn’t add any oil and is lightweight. Helps to firm my skin and gives it a nice healthy look without clogging pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer, I love the consistency and texture of this cream, it feels refreshing and very light on the skin, it feels luxurious and my skin instantly feels firm and hydrated. It is an expensive cream but it is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like how this cream feels like a luxurious experience. It’s very hydrating and enriching without being overly too heavy. The cream feels incredibly enriching and hydrating and layers well with my other make up products I got a sample, so that’s perfect to go for travel. This was gifted by La mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer's The New Moisturizing Fresh Cream in the convenient 3.5ml size offers a luxurious hydration experience in a compact package. This lightweight yet deeply nourishing cream revitalizes and replenishes the skin, leaving it soft, supple, and radiant. Infused with La Mer's signature Miracle Broth™ and potent marine ingredients, it provides intense hydration while soothing and calming the complexion. I appreciate its fast-absorbing formula, which doesn't leave any greasy residue behind, making it perfect for use under makeup or as part of my nighttime skincare routine. With continued use, my skin feels rejuvenated, refreshed, and visibly healthier. A must-have for achieving that coveted La Mer glow on-the-go. complimentary from lamer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer Moisturizing Cream is a luxurious indulgence that lives up to its reputation. The rich, velvety texture deeply hydrates, leaving my skin feeling incredibly soft and plump. The iconic formula makes it a truly pampering experience. If you're looking for a high-end moisturizer that delivers on its promises, La Mer is worth the splurge. Gifted by Lamer!
